statements: UPDATE PatientData SET patient_name = 'John Doe', date_of_birth = '1990-05-15' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE PatientData SET medical_history = 'No significant past medical history', test_results = '{"blood_pressure": {"systolic": 120, "diastolic": 80}}', patient_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE patient_id = '98765432-1234-5678-abcd-0987654321ef';
UPDATE PatientData SET date_of_birth = '1990-05-15', medical_history = 'Diagnosed with hypertension' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE PatientData SET test_results = '{"blood_pressure": {"systolic": 120, "diastolic": 80}, "cholesterol": 180}' WHERE patient_name = 'Alice Smith';
UPDATE patients SET patient_name = 'John Doe', gender = 'M' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE tests SET result = 'Negative' WHERE test_id = 3;
UPDATE patients SET patient_name='John Doe', birthdate='1987-05-15', gender='M' WHERE patient_id=101;
UPDATE tests SET result='Positive', test_date='2022-10-20' WHERE test_id=201;
UPDATE patient_data SET patient_name = 'John Doe' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE test_results SET result = 'Negative' WHERE test_id = 2;
UPDATE patient_data SET patient_name = 'John Doe', date_of_birth = '1990-05-15' WHERE patient_id = 1;

UPDATE patients SET patient_name = 'John Doe' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE medical_history SET treatment = 'Medication A' WHERE record_id = 5;
UPDATE patients SET patient_name='John Doe', date_of_birth='1990-05-15' WHERE patient_id=1;

UPDATE patients SET name = 'John Doe', dob = '1990-05-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE appointments SET reason = 'Follow-up visit', doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' WHERE appointment_id = 3;

UPDATE medications SET dosage='10mg', frequency='Twice a day' WHERE patient_id=3;
